title: Scenario-Based Training Course for Strengthening Humanitarian Logistics Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Interactive learning environments using personal devices (BYOD) for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and evaluate real-world humanitarian crisis scenarios to propose logistics process improvements
Learners can develop emergency supply distribution plans through team-based activities and create actionable roadmaps
Learners enhance their ability to visualize logistics data and write reports using digital tools (computer/mobile)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
